Articles.Content:
Is it a spaceplane? is it a rover? no its THE MEKHA TENGU CHALLANGE!

Koviet engineering korps  is looking to see if any kerbal is smart enough to make a hybrid spaceplane/rover that can cut down the pollution that is caused by multi staged interplanetary launches and a rover that can be returned back to kerbin,and be used as a gunship for a(totally fake) war(that does not involve nuclear weapons and napalm).

WINNERS WILL BE DECIDED BY A RNG.

RULES: 1.post screenshots 2.can have very witty names 3. must use BDA for weapons 4. list mods used(if you are using any modded parts that are not from BDA)
